bug.author: kzos
bug.summary: Hexagon build fails, readme.md needs to be revisited.
bug.description: OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64bits Android Version: 7.1 (Nougat) NDK Version: android-ndk-r12b Hexagon build readme should be revisited after recent code changes. I used same command as given in the readme.md tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_android.sh -x /home/kzos/TFHEXLIBS -t hexagon_graph_execution -s /home/kzos/experiment/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/sub_makefiles/hexagon_graph_execution/Makefile.in I am getting below error: ' tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile:46: *** "hexagon is only supported on Android". Stop. `

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/satok16>@satok16</denchmark-link> , mind to share quick build-command/script for hexagon before you publish ?
The code has not been changed while. Try checking the value in TARGET.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/satok16>@satok16</denchmark-link>
I am checking, were you able to get the hexagon_graph_execution built using same command mentioned in README?
